name: Soulscape (itch) (ultra-rogue-studio, legume racine)
description:
PRESS F11 FOR FULL SCREEN

You play as Souly, a little soul who fights against all her regrets and anxieties by using the power of all the beautiful souls she has met in her life.

Each soul has active and passive properties, you can swap souls to choose which one is active

Controls :

left click : shoot

right click : swap soul

escape : pause the game and show soul description

WASD / ZQSD : move
